let us quickly recap now on the events
how these attacks unfolded at 1:40 p.m.
local time police responded to reports
of shots fired in central Christchurch
people were urged to stay indoors and
report any suspicious behavior
shortly afterwards all schools in the
city were placed into lockdown at 2:30
p.m. police described it as an active
shooter situation later at 4:00 p.m. New
Zealand Police Commissioner Mike Bush
said they'd been multiple fatalities at
two locations both mosques in
Christchurch he said that one person had
been taken into custody but warned it
was unclear if more than one person was
involved police also urged all mosques
across New Zealand to shut their doors
